text: Roberto Alcaide Garcia (born March 22, 1978 in Madrid) is a cyclist from Spain. He has a physical disability: He is a C4/LC2 type cyclist. He raced at the 2004 Summer Paralympics. He was the first racer to finish in the Individual Pursuit track LC2 race. He finished second in the Combined Road LC2 race. He raced at the 2008 Summer Paralympics. He was the second racer to finish in the Individual Pursuit track LC2 race. He was the third racer to finish in the Road Trial LC2 race. He raced at the 2012 Summer Paralympics. == References == Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish cyclists Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:2008 Summer Paralympics Category:2012 Summer Paralympics
